content: here is an easy to follow free totoro crochet pattern to help you create this cute totoro amigurumi set pattern includes the blue totoro and his little partner chibi totoro in the white use this pattern also to create the gray totoro with a cute leaf hat on his head to keep the rain away totoro is the keeper of the forest who helps two little girls when their mother is going through an illness *my neighbor totoro* is one of my favorite classics and i love the wonder magic and adventure of nature he represents **pattern level** easy **need to know ** crochet in the round single_crochet how to increase and decrease how to sew parts together **finished size ** blue or gray totoro - approximately 7 in / 18 cm tall including ear chibi totoro - approximately 3 in / 8 cm tall i d love to see how your projects turn out so please do share with me and tag me on my instagram 1 or facebook 2 1 http //www instagram com/ami_amour 2 http //www facebook com/amiamourfan
